Package marc.nguyen.minesweeper.client.presentation.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • marc.nguyen.minesweeper.client.presentation.controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, Controller<GameModel,​GameView>
    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, Controller<GameModel,​GameView>
    The Game Controller.

    Mutate the game model (local minefield, server's minefield, score...) and notify the game view.

    Factory should be used as the primary constructor. The Frame should assist the injection to avoid using Singletons with the presentation dependencies (model and view must NOT be singletons). (Note that we could have used member injection using a setter or a builder.)

    See Also:
    GameModel, GameView, GameController.Factory
